pages.text: Crimson Steel can only be obtained by smelting a compound of Crimson Iron Dust, Coal Dust, Magma Cream, and Wither Skull Fragments.$(br2)Crimson Steel tools are required to mine Ender Essence Ore.

Also, Crimson Steel is required for the Osmium Compressor. It may seem like a lot of work for a machine that only has two uses, but persuading osmium to become a different state of matter requires expensive components!
